description: Inadequate fall protection at elevator shaft openings during core work
resolution: Installed permanent guardrails and safety nets; daily inspection protocol established
notes: All elevator openings now protected per OSHA 1926.502

description: Silica dust exposure during concrete cutting exceeds PEL
notes: Wet-cutting methods implemented; air monitoring ongoing

description: Crane swing radius encroaches on public sidewalk during steel erection
notes: MOT plan revision needed; coordinate with city for sidewalk closure

description: Housekeeping deficiencies on levels 3-5 creating trip hazards
notes: Daily cleanup enforcement memo issued to all subcontractors

description: Trench excavation deeper than 4ft without shoring or sloping
resolution: Work stopped; trench box installed before re-entry. Subcontractor received written warning.

description: Missing GFCIs on temporary power distribution during wet conditions
notes: Electrician ordered additional GFCI-protected spider boxes

description: Ladder access to roof not secured; improper setup angle
notes: Ladder safety training refresher scheduled for next toolbox talk
